title: "What can a mixnet do? Strategies for network-level anonymity"
abstract: This workshop will introduce mixnet technology as a tool to achieve network-level anonymity for internet traffic. We will see hands on how a mixnet works, where the idea came from, and discuss other strategies for protecting privacy online against state and corporate surveillance.

persons.name: Casey Ford
persons.biography: Casey has a PhD in Philosophy from the University of Guelph. He is currently researching anti-surveillance and anarchist technologies. He is the Comms Lead and lead writer for Nym.
